ModMetaData.name: Farming Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds events and chemicals to the farmers of RimWorld.
- Events added: * Pests - Insects that eat up all your crops * Weeds - Quick growing plants that destroy your crops
- Chemicals added: * Pesticide (Tribal) - Prevents the Pests-event * Herbicide (Tribal) - Prevents the Weeds-event * Fungicide (Tribal) - Prevents the vanilla Blight-event * DDT (Industrial) - Prevents all events but lowers yeild * Chemical Spray (Spacer) - Prevents all events and increases yield and growthspeed
- Will use resources from these mods if they are loaded: * Legacy Ark - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2070686241 * VGP Garden Medicine - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007063140 * Jecs Tobacco and Cigarettes - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2208107297 * Megafauna - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938 * Survivalist's Additions - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1550854139 * RimCuisine 2: Smokes and Shrooms Expansion - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2069579592
---
